intro: Self starter, quick learner, passionate problem solver with 5+ years of industry experience in designing and developing scalable applications
about: I have 5+ years of experience in software development.
I have extensive experience in developing scalable applications with experience in Banking, Retail and Telecommunication domain and I am always excited to take up new challenges and roles.
Well versed with all the phases of SDLC, Agile, CI/CD, TDD and clean code practices.
Experience in mentoring and leading teams, prioritising tasks and delivering products.
I like to explore new technologies and write blogs about the same.
I like to ride bike, read books, watch movies and think.
Interested in Dev-ops, micro-services and cloud computing.
